text.section: Subject to any regulation that the Board adopts, the Board may reinstate a license that has been revoked.

A license may be reinstated under this section only on:
the basis of evidence submitted to the Board after the revocation and not available, before the revocation, to the individual seeking reinstatement;
the affirmative vote of a majority of the authorized members of the Board; and
payment to the Board of a fee of $5.
